title: Gardener's Sea Salt
description: Note: the bottle has 8.5 oz of salt- the center of the bottle is taken up with a glass insert to prevent caking- you are not getting a bottle that has 100 percent volume filled with salt. Gardener's Salt makes for the perfect edition to every kitchen. This salt and herb blend of garlic, chervil, parsley, & tarragon is versatile enough to season anything. You can add this seasoning to sauteed vegetables, sauces, soups, and meats. This seasoning comes in a convenient, refillable grinder, so it can be stored on your table for you guests to use with ease. Ingredients: Dried Sea Salt, Tarragon, Parsley, Garlic, Chervil Use in your favorite #sourdough bread recipe.
